content: **knitted hat / balaclava for children in drops lima the piece is worked with textured pattern and ribbed edging sizes 2 to 12 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no li-014-bn yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 2 - 3/5 - 6/9 - 10/12 years fits head size 48/50 - 50/52 - 52/54 - 54/56 cm **materials** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-150-150-200 g colour 9015 grey **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm for textured pattern drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm for rib needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
